#1 hander
lives in.. forest area
eats... dust particles
discovered by valendar
they exist everywhere but like to spend time in forest areas for fun.
#2 lonliest corona
lives in.. right now a kind library
eats... bacteria and air floaters
discovered by morti∞
Usually super microscopic, all impossible to see, but this germ grew to the size of a grapefruit.It's just a simple cold, maybe a runny nose for a week, but due to its size, it can no longer infect anyone. No germ has ever gotten this big before, too big to see any of its friends anymore. No germ has also ever gotten this lonely before.
#3 mete bunny
lives in.. grass, forests, etc. love sweet smelling flowers
eats... carnivorous, usually smaller predators or chunks from larger fauna
discovered by mala
their fur is always wet and resembles raw meat. they smell like normal rabbits which attracts prey and those who find them cute. they roll over like dogs in hope you’ll rub their tummy then chomp at your limbs.
#4 winj
lives in.. wet caves
eats... algae and slimes
discovered by ribose
they live mostly underground, making their nests at the edges of subterranean lakes and rivers. if the weather is just right (cool, misty, not too much moonlight), winj can sometimes be spotted on the surface.
#5 worm-girl
lives in.. crevices
eats... smaller bugs
discovered by kyu
mix of caterpillar and shrimp. they live both on land and in water. they have pointy feelers and shiny round tails. known for being escape artists.
#6 zarqa
lives in.. the underside of cliffs, branches, and hanging objects in cold, dry areas with not that much wind
eats... light that bounces off the floor
discovered by demo
a paper thin and almost transparent flower that surrounds itself with a faint black haze. the black haze emanates from the flowers underside, making it difficult to spot. if you do see it, don't look for too long. it will make you feel *funny.* they're constantly shifting subtly in color and shape.
